biography.summary: Raphael G. Warnock is an American pastor and politician serving as the junior United States Senator from Georgia since 2021. He was first elected in a January 2021 special election and was reelected to a full term beginning in 2023.
biography.education: Attended Morehouse College (BA) and earned a Master of Divinity from Union Theological Seminary.
biography.career: Prior to his Senate career, Warnock was the senior pastor of Ebenezer Baptist Church in Atlanta and a prominent community advocate.

contact.office_address: 717 Hart Senate Office Building, Washington DC 20510
